name: Aphrodite's Organic Cafe
address: 3605 W 4th Ave, Vancouver, BC V6R 1P2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Spanish Banks Burrito
hasMenuItem.description: Scrambled farm fresh eggs, baby spinach, aged white Cheddar, wrapped in a toasted roma tomato tortilla, served with fresh salsa, organic green salad and rosemary home fries.

hasMenuItem.name: l'Omelette Bar
hasMenuItem.description: Create your own three-egg and aged white Cheddar omelette. Served with rosemary  home fries, organic green salad  and our  homemade multi-grain toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Benny
hasMenuItem.description:
Choose from three options:      
1.	Two River’s Nitrate Free Back Bacon, Garlic Aioli, Baby Spinach, Salsa Fresca, Parsley 
2.	Roma Tomato, Golden Ear’s Brie, Arugula, Avocado, Red Onion Relish
3.	 BC Smoked Salmon, Golden Ear’s Neufchatel, Spinach, Capers, Dill

     All are served on a toasted English muffin topped with two organic farm fresh poached eggs and covered in lemony hollandaise. Served with rosemary home fries and garden green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Buddha Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Quinoa, roasted garlic hummus,  leafy greens, shredded cabbage, carrots, and beets, topped with toasted pumpkin seeds. Served with our housemade nutritional yeast dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Caramelized Leek and Lentil Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Served with fresh homemade bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Additional Sides
hasMenuItem.description: Choose from a variety of sides: slices of avocado (1/4 or 1/2), smoky bison sausage, various bacon cuts (strip, back), ham slice, homefries (large or small), vegetarian options like maple tempeh, smoked tofu, and tofurkey sausage, or a sockeye salmon filet.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon, Tomato and Arugula Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Local, nitrate-free artisan bacon, fresh roma tomatoes, baby arugula and garlic aioli on our homemade hand sliced multi-grain bread. Served with an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Aphrodite Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Three organic farm fresh eggs, served as you like them, with your choice of protein. Served with rosemary home fries, our house made multi-grain toast and garden green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Field of Greens
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan, gluten-friendly. Baby organic greens, shredded beets and carrots, tomato, cucumber, toasted pumpkin seeds, curried chickpeas and house dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Organic Lemonade
hasMenuItem.description: Organic Lemonade, available in flavors like Black Tea, Blueberry, Cranberry, Green Tea, Pure Lemon, Rosehip Ginger.

hasMenuItem.name: Aphrodite Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed organic berries, banana and orange juice. 16 oz

hasMenuItem.name: Salt Spring Frittata
hasMenuItem.description: Spinach, caramelized onions, cherry tomatoes and goat feta. Served with rosemary homefries, our homemade multi-grain toast and an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Spanish Banks Burrito
hasMenuItem.description: Scrambled farm fresh eggs, baby spinach, aged white Cheddar, wrapped in a toasted roma tomato tortilla, served with fresh salsa, organic green salad and rosemary home fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Benny
hasMenuItem.description:
Choose from three options:      
1.	Two River’s Nitrate Free Back Bacon, Garlic Aioli, Baby Spinach, Salsa Fresca, Parsley 
2.	Roma Tomato, Golden Ear’s Brie, Arugula, Avocado, Red Onion Relish
3.	 BC Smoked Salmon, Golden Ear’s Neufchatel, Spinach, Capers, Dill

     All are served on a toasted English muffin topped with two organic farm fresh poached eggs and covered in lemony hollandaise. Served with rosemary home fries and garden green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Salt Spring Frittata
hasMenuItem.description: Spinach, caramelized onions, cherry tomatoes and goat feta. Served with rosemary homefries, our homemade multi-grain toast and an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Aphrodite Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Three organic farm fresh eggs, served as you like them, with your choice of protein. Served with rosemary home fries, our house made multi-grain toast and garden green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Aphrodite's Stuffed French Toast
hasMenuItem.description: Two hand-cut slices of our homemade bread stuffed with seasonal fruit quark, served with fresh fruit, raspberry coulis, chantilly whipped cream and maple syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Ham & Egger
hasMenuItem.description: A fried farm fresh egg,  Two River's back  bacon and aged white Cheddar on our homemade mulit-grain bun. Served with organic green salad and home fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Roasted Tofu Scramble Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Scrambled tofu roasted with shallot, fennel, and hearty greens, wrapped in a toasted roma tomato tortilla, served with vegan cilantro cream, rosemary home fries and organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: l'Omelette Bar
hasMenuItem.description: Create your own three-egg and aged white Cheddar omelette. Served with rosemary  home fries, organic green salad  and our  homemade multi-grain toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Green Eggs & Ham
hasMenuItem.description: Two farm fresh eggs scrambled with our spinach pesto, hearty greens, caramelized onion, and cheddar cheese. Served with ham, bacon or back bacon (or any of our vegetarian options) home fries, organic greens and our homemade multi-grain toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Wild, line-caught coho salmon fillet with spinach pesto, garlic aioli, tomato and pickled red onions on our homemade multi-grain bun. Served with rosemary home fries and an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon, Tomato and Arugula Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Local, nitrate-free artisan bacon, fresh roma tomatoes, baby arugula and garlic aioli on our homemade hand sliced multi-grain bread. Served with an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Curried Chickpea Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Smashed curried chickpeas blended with apple, carrot, hummus, and herbs, topped with vegan cilantro cream and mixed greens on our hand-cut multi-grain bread. Served with a meadow side salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Portobello Mushroom Burger
hasMenuItem.description: A jumbo Portobello mushroom oven roasted and topped with melted vegan mozzarella, served on our housemade, toasted multigrain bun with spinach pesto, vegan cilantro cream caramelized onions, baby arugula and sliced roma tomatoes. Served with rosemary home fries and an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Salad Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Wild Coho salmon mixed with chopped celery, red onion roasted garlic aioli, capers, baby gherkins  and fresh dill on our homemade hand-sliced multi-grain bread. Served with an organic green salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Buddha Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Quinoa, roasted garlic hummus,  leafy greens, shredded cabbage, carrots, and beets, topped with toasted pumpkin seeds. Served with our housemade nutritional yeast dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Field of Greens
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan, gluten-friendly. Baby organic greens, shredded beets and carrots, tomato, cucumber, toasted pumpkin seeds, curried chickpeas and house dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Additional Sides
hasMenuItem.description: Choose from a variety of sides: slices of avocado (1/4 or 1/2), smoky bison sausage, various bacon cuts (strip, back), ham slice, homefries (large or small), vegetarian options like maple tempeh, smoked tofu, and tofurkey sausage, or a sockeye salmon filet.

hasMenuItem.name: Caramelized Leek and Lentil Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Served with fresh homemade bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach, Apple & Pecan Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Organic baby spinach, sliced apple and toasted pecans  with cherry balsamic dressing, goat feta and pickled red onion.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Local organic turkey, seasonal vegetables and herbs in our famous pie crust. Dairy Free

hasMenuItem.name: Ham & Emmental Quiche
hasMenuItem.description: Local nitrate free artisan ham, Emmental, capers, roasted tomato herbs and Dijon blended with eggs and cream and baked in our famous pie crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach Feta Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Spinach, kale, potatoes and sweet peas with feta, fresh dill in our famous pie crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Wild Mushroom Quiche
hasMenuItem.description: BC Shiitake and oyster mushrooms, baby spinach and Gruyere, blended with eggs and cream and baked in our famous pie crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Raspberry Rhubarb Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Tangy raspberries and tart rhubarb encased in a flaky, golden crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Pie
hasMenuItem.description: A slice of pie filled with plump, juicy blueberries encased in a golden, flaky crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Banana Cream Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Rich layers of chocolate cream, fresh bananas, and whipped topping in a flaky pie crust, garnished with chocolate shavings.

hasMenuItem.name: Bumbleberry Pie
hasMenuItem.description: A medley of mixed berries encased in a flaky pastry crust, often including strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Rhubarb
hasMenuItem.description: Sliced strawberries and rhubarb, combined and baked into a pie, offering a balance of sweet and tart flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Tender apples encased in a flaky, golden-brown crust with a hint of cinnamon.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Meringue
hasMenuItem.description: A slice of pie with a tangy lemon filling topped with a fluffy, golden-brown meringue.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth pumpkin filling in a flaky, golden crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Pecan
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten-free, vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: Banana Vanilla Bean Pie
hasMenuItem.description: A smooth vanilla bean custard filling layered with fresh bananas and topped with whipped cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Pecan Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Generous pecan filling atop a buttery, flaky crust, sweetened to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Raspberry Cream Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth chocolate filling with a hint of raspberry, topped with whipped cream and fresh raspberries.

hasMenuItem.name: Key Lime Pie (Dairy Free)
hasMenuItem.description: Graham cracker crust with a tart key lime filling, typically topped with whipped cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Aphrodite Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed organic berries, banana and orange juice. 16 oz

hasMenuItem.name: Artemis
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of fresh Carrot, Ginger and Apple juices

hasMenuItem.name: Eros Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description:
Cacao, dates, banana, oat milk.
16 oz

hasMenuItem.name: Gaia
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of fresh Kale, Beet, Carrot and Ginger juices

hasMenuItem.name: Hera Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: Turmeric, black pepper, ginger, cinnamon, cardamom, clove, banana, dates and oat milk. 16 oz

hasMenuItem.name: Hestia
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of fresh Kale, Apple and Lime Juices

hasMenuItem.name: Iris
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of fresh Beet, Apple, Ginger and Lemon juices

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Squeezed Grapefruit Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh squeezed grapefruit juice, available in 12 oz or 16 oz sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Green Goddess Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: Leafy greens, ginger, banana, spirulina and oat milk. 16 oz

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Cold iced latte with customizable milk options: whole, skim, oat, soy, almond.

hasMenuItem.name: Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh juice available in large or small sizes. Choose between apple or orange flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Americano
hasMenuItem.description: Chilled, refreshing espresso over ice—a classic Americano served cold.

hasMenuItem.name: House Brewed Iced Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Crafted in-house, this refreshing tea is served over ice and may be sweetened upon request.

hasMenuItem.name: Milk
hasMenuItem.description: Milk, available in large or small. Choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, almond.

hasMenuItem.name: Organic Lemonade
hasMenuItem.description: Organic Lemonade, available in flavors like Black Tea, Blueberry, Cranberry, Green Tea, Pure Lemon, Rosehip Ginger.

hasMenuItem.name: Refreshing Iced Green Mint Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Unsweetened.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso Macchiato
hasMenuItem.description: Espresso macchiato with choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Americano
hasMenuItem.description: Americano with choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Americano Misto
hasMenuItem.description: Americano with a touch of steamed milk. Choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Caffe Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Espresso with rich chocolate, choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk. Available in 12 oz or 16 oz sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso
hasMenuItem.description: Espresso with choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Caffe Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Espresso blended with your choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk. Available in 12 oz or 16 oz.

hasMenuItem.name: Cappuccino
hasMenuItem.description: Espresso and steamed milk. Choice of whole, skim, oat, soy, or almond milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Chocolate
hasMenuItem.description: Made from dark Callebaut chocolate and your choice of milk. Topped with chantilly cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Mulled Ginger Rosehip Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Ginger, raspberry leaf, rosehip, beet, cane sugar.

hasMenuItem.name: Allan's Spice Chai Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Secret recipe of warming spices steeped with a blend of black teas.

hasMenuItem.name: Matcha Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Ritual grade matcha steamed with your choice of milk. (Unsweetened so you can sweeten according to your taste)

hasMenuItem.name: Specialty Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Premium quality, organic, artisan blended teas from Whistler BC.

hasMenuItem.name: Golden Turmeric Milk
hasMenuItem.description: Soothing turmeric, spices and pure vanilla steamed with your choice of milk. (Unsweetened so you can sweeten according to your taste)

review.reviewBody:
I have ordered this soup many times 
Soup was very watery today
Burnt omelette. And toast. Cant believe kitchen sent like this
